### Replace_With_Short_Descriptive_Name
## Description: 

**Definition of Ready:**
- [ ] Stakeholders have approved research
- [ ] User story completed
- [ ] Questions still unanswered

**Definition of Done:**
- [ ] Research peer-reviewed 
- [ ] Research documented
- [ ] New tickets made if relevant
